short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know when your favorite streamers are live

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that allows you to keep up in real-time with the members of OfflineTV:
- Real-time notifications
- Instagram and Twitter access buttons
- Last YouTube video access
- Facebook gaming support (know when toast goes live)
- Multistream support
